text: Víctor Hipólito Martínez (November 21, 1924 - November 20, 2017) was an Argentine lawyer and politician. He was best known for his position as Vice President of Argentina during the Raúl Alfonsín administration serving from 1983 to 1989. He was born in Córdoba, Argentina. Martínez died on November 20, 2017 at a clinic in Villa Allende, Córdoba, Argentina of complications from pneumonia at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Vice presidents of Argentina
title: Víctor Hipólito Martínez
